name: regionalism
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ]
  politics a feeling of loyalty to a particular part of a country and a wish for it to be more politically independent
[ C ]
  language a phrase, custom, etc. that is used or found only in a particular part of a country or area: "Spider" is a New England regionalism for a type of frying pan.
